title: We Finally Got Our Hands On the Chinese Bike That’s Sponsoring a World Tour Team: Taipei Cycle Show 2025
content:
We got our hands on XDS-Astana's race road bike for 2025 from Chinese bike manufacturer XDS.

Read the full article at We Finally Got Our Hands On the Chinese Bike That’s Sponsoring a World Tour Team: Taipei Cycle Show 2025 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
